bwwExcerpt: It becomes clear by the second act that Greenberg's story - or the acts she discovered - cannot sustain this musical....An actress portraying Leslie Gore makes an appearance singing "It's My Party" but it's not clear why. Toward the end, it really has become a jukebox musical, adding songs for atmosphere rather than consistency.
